content: stitch wyif sl2 repeat row 1 & 2 until you have 28 sts ending with row 2 b section row 1 k2 yo *k2 p1* in pattern across the row always slipping the last 2 stitches of the row wyib row 2 purl all until last two stitches wyif sl2 repeat b section row 1 & 2 five more times increase of 6 sts complete a section row 1 & 2 six times increase of 6 sts c section row 1 k2 yo k1 *yo k2tog* until 3 remain yo k1 sl2 row 2 *purl sl2 wyif increase of 2 sts complete a section row 1 & 2 six times after 8 total repeats of abac complete the a section final time and then proceed to the coda section coda row 1 k2 yo k1 *yo k2tog * row 2 purl all except for last 2 stitches sl2 wyif when you have approximately 7 grams of yarn remaining about 8 repeats of the coda row 1 and 2 finish with a picot bind off https //youtu be/5jnrwvv0bui weave ends and block
